long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transparent coupon fetcher, this extension does not in any way modifies or interacts with the webpages you navigate, it simply works as an automatic interface between the known page simplycodes.com (not affiliated in any way) and your browsing experience. The focus of this extension is to grow awareness of malicious browser extensions that seek to SCAM content creators out of their affiliated product links.

This project is open source:
https://github.com/Maxsafer/TransparentCoupons
